posts.name: Beck's Cajun Cafe - Reading Terminal Market
posts.note: Bustling counter serve dishing up Cajun & Creole comfort food to the farmer's-market crowd. You need to make sure order a train wreck.

posts.name: Beiler's Bakery - Reading Terminal Market
posts.note: Destination for baked goods, including Pennsylvania Dutch classics & a variety of housemade donuts. Blueberry or apple fritter are a must have.

posts.name: D'Angelo Brothers
posts.note: Area institution specializing in house made exotic sausages, sustainable game, specialty pâtés and roasts.

posts.name: Di Bruno Brothers - South Philly location
posts.note: Acclaimed gourmet destination supplying meats, cheeses & prepared foods, plus specialty items.

posts.name: Isgro's Bakery
posts.note: Venerable bake shop turning out cannoli, cakes, cookies, custards, tarts and other Italian pastries.

posts.name: Reading Terminal Market
posts.note: Famous indoor farmer's market offering diverse fare, housewares and area specialties since 1892.

posts.name: Tommy Di Nic's - Reading Terminal Market
posts.note: Crowds pack this venerable Reading Terminal Market sandwich counter celebrated for its roast pork and make sure to get sharp provolone on your snadwich.
